label: linearUnitWidthMeasure
comment: A measure of the width of this logistics means of transport.
The measure of the width component of this spatial dimension.

rangeIncludes.comment: The numeric value determined by linear measuring.

domainIncludes.comment: The devices used to convey goods or other objects from place to place during logistics cargo movements.
A measure of spatial extent of an object, such as the length, breadth or height of a shipping container.
